TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripProgressBar extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示 中包含的 Windows 进度栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是针对在 中进行托管而优化的 。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 寄宿控件的属性和事件的子集在 级别公开，但基础 控件可通过 属性完全访问。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. 控件直观地指示长时间操作的进度。A control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation. 控件将显示一个条形图，它在操作过程中从左到右填充系统突出显示颜色。The control displays a bar that fills in from left to right with the system highlight color as an operation progresses. > [!NOTE] > 只能横向定向 控件。The control can only be oriented horizontally. 当应用程序执行任务（例如，复制文件或打印文档）时，通常使用 控件。The control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents. 如果没有视觉提示，应用程序的用户可能会认为应用程序无响应。Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue. 使用 向用户通知应用程序正在执行的任务较长，应用程序仍在响应。Use the to notify the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding. "" 和 "" 属性定义用于表示任务进度的值的范围。The and properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task. 属性通常设置为零值， 属性通常设置为指示任务完成的值。The property is typically set to a value of zero, and the property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task. 例如，若要在复制一组文件时正确显示进度，则可以将 属性设置为要复制的文件的总数。For example, to display the progress properly when copying a group of files, the property could be set to the total number of files to be copied. 属性表示应用程序完成操作的进度。The property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation. 由于控件中显示的栏是块的集合，因此 显示的值仅接近 属性的当前值。Because the bar displayed in the control is a collection of blocks, the value displayed by the only approximates the property's current value. 根据 的大小， 属性确定何时显示下一个块。Based on the size of the , the property determines when to display the next block. 除了直接更改 属性外，还可以通过多种方式来修改 显示的值。There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the other than changing the property directly. 您可以使用 属性来指定特定的值以便按 递增，然后调用 方法来递增该值。You can use the property to specify a specific value to increment the property by, and then call the method to increment the value. 若要更改增量值，可以使用 方法，并指定一个值，通过该值来递增 属性。To vary the increment value, you can use the method and specify a value by which to increment the property. 替换了较旧的 控件，但保留该控件是为了向后兼容。 replaces the older control, which is nevertheless retained for backward compatibility. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于计算斐波那契数字序列的 。The following code example demonstrates a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.

summary.span: 按指定的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以按特定量递增进度栏的值。The method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount. 此递增进度栏的方法类似于将 属性与 方法一起使用。This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the property with the method. 属性指定 的当前位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在调用 方法之后， 属性大于 属性的值，则 属性将保留在 属性的值上。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在使用 `value` 参数中指定的负值调用 方法之后， 属性小于 属性的值，则 属性将保留在 属性的值上。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示每次 显示更新之间的延迟（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value representing the delay between each display update, in milliseconds.

value.span: 表示延迟的一个整数（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: An integer representing the delay, in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置显示更新的延迟。The property gets or sets the delay of display update. 因此，当您减小 属性的值时，动画的速度将增加。Therefore, as you decrease the value of the property, the speed of the animation increases.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Maximum { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Maximum : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为此 定义的范围上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the upper bound of the range that is defined for this .
An integer representing the upper bound of the range.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定 属性的上限。This property specifies the upper limit of the property. 更改 属性的值时，将重新绘制 控件以反映控件的新范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 如果 属性的值等于 属性的值，则会完全填充进度栏。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is completely filled. 您可以使用此属性来指定必须将 属性设置为的值（通过设置 属性或使用 或 方法）来指示操作已完成。You can use this property to specify a value that the property must be set to (by setting the property or using the or methods) to indicate that an operation is complete. 例如，你可以将 属性的值设置为文件复制操作中的文件总数。For example, you can set the value of the property to the total number of files in a file copy operation. 每次复制文件时，都可以将 属性增加1，直到复制文件总数。Each time a file is copied, the property can be increased by one until the total number of files is copied. 此时，将完全填充进度栏。At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 中的 属性，该属性用于计算波那契数字的序列。The following code example demonstrates a use of the property in a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: Gets or sets the lower bound of the range that is defined for this .
An integer representing the lower bound of the range.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定 属性的下限。This property specifies the lower limit of the property. 更改 属性的值时，将重新绘制 控件以反映控件的新范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 如果 属性的值等于 属性的值，则进度栏为空。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is empty. 若要更改进度栏的值，请使用带有 方法的 属性，使用 方法，或直接设置 属性的值。To change the value of the progress bar, use the property with the method, use the method, or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 中的 属性，该属性用于计算波那契数字的序列。The following code example demonstrates a use of the property in a that calculates a sequence of Fibonacci numbers. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example that provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PerformStep() cil managed

summary.span: 按照 属性的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将进度栏的值增加 属性指定的数量。The method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the property. 您可以使用 属性指定操作中每个已完成任务更改进度栏值的量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 例如，如果要复制一组文件，则可能需要将 "" 属性的值设置为 "1"，并将 "" 属性的值设置为要复制的文件的总数。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 复制每个文件时，可以调用 方法，按 属性的值递增进度栏。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果希望更灵活地控制进度栏的值，可以使用 方法或直接设置 属性的值。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. 属性指定 的当前位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在调用 方法之后， 属性大于 属性的值，则 属性将保留在 属性的值上。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在使用 `value` 参数中指定的负值调用 方法之后， 属性小于 属性的值，则 属性将保留在 属性的值上。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示当 属性设置为 时， 布局是从右向左还是从左向右。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the layout is right-to-left or left-to-right when the property is set to .

value.span: 若要在 属性设置为 时打开镜像并从右向左为控件布局，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to turn on mirroring and lay out control from right to left when the property is set to ; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制从右到左写入语言的国际应用程序的布局。Use the property to control the layout of international applications in which the language is written from right to left. 当 `true` 属性并且 属性设置为 时，将在 Windows 窗体上启用镜像并且控件位置和文本将从右到左。When the property is `true`, and the property is set to , mirroring will be enabled on the Windows form and control placement and text will be from right to left.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RightToLeftLayoutChanged As EventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ToolStripProgressBar1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripProgressBar1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#608](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#608)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#608](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#608)]
